welcome_message_body: Welcome to Jeddah, Saudi Arabia! Get ready to experience the city's unique blend of ancient charm and modern flair, renowned for its stunning Red Sea coast and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your time exploring all that Jeddah has to offer!

restaurants.name: فروخ
restaurants.description: فروخ is a comfort food restaurant located in جدّة.

restaurants.name: The Cheesecake Factory (ذي تشيز كيك فاكتوري)
restaurants.description: The Cheesecake Factory (ذي تشيز كيك فاكتوري) is a american restaurant located in Jeddah.
restaurants.address: Prince Mohammed Bin Abdulaziz S (Tahlia St. | شارع التحلية), Jeddah

restaurants.name: Texas Roadhouse (تكساس رودهاوس)
restaurants.description: Texas Roadhouse (تكساس رودهاوس) is a steakhouse located in Jeddah.

restaurants.name: Crave (كريڤ)
restaurants.description: Crave (كريڤ) is a burger joint located in جدة.

restaurants.name: Fuddruckers (فدركرز)
restaurants.description: Fuddruckers (فدركرز) is a american restaurant located in Jeddah.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of King Abdulaziz International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal dedicated to international flights and operated by Saudi Arabian Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network after watching a short advertisement video.
